statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity;
SELECT company_name, disposal_date, disposal_type FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_status = 'Approved';
SELECT disposal_quantity, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill';
SELECT disposal_id, company_name, disposal_status FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, disposal_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, disposal_quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name, disposal_type, disposal_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_location = 'California' AND disposal_status = 'Approved'
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_quantity > 1000 AND disposal_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY disposal_date LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_type = 'Recycling' AND disposal_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY disposal_quantity DESC
SELECT company_name, disposal_date, disposal_type FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activity WHERE disposal_quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND disposal_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT activity_id, disposal_location, compliance_status FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, waste_type, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%city%' AND waste_type = 'Batteries' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT disposal_date, waste_type, compliance_status FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE waste_type IN ('Chemicals', 'Paints') ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_id, disposal_location, compliance_status FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY disposal_date ASC, disposal_location;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, disposal_location, disposal_agent FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, waste_quantity, disposal_id FROM waste_classification ORDER BY waste_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, inspection_date FROM compliance_records WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, waste_quantity FROM waste_classification WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous';
SELECT disposal_agent, disposal_location, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND inspection_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT disposal_id, disposal_agent, compliance_status FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities JOIN compliance_records ON hazardous_waste_disposal_activities.disposal_id = compliance_records.disposal_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT location, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities ORDER BY disposal_date;
SELECT * FROM disposal_contractors WHERE contractor_name = 'ABC Disposal';
SELECT category_name, description FROM waste_categories WHERE category_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC, phone_number;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT location, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities WHERE quantity >= 1000;
SELECT a.location, b.contractor_name FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_activities a JOIN disposal_contractors b ON a.hazardous_waste_id = b.contractor_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM waste_categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity;
SELECT activity_id, disposal_date, disposal_location FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DisposalLocation WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT activity_id, waste_type, compliance_status FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, compliance_status ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE inspector_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity GROUP BY disposal_location ORDER BY total_disposals DESC
SELECT activity_id, disposal_method, compliance_status FROM HazardousWasteDisposalActivity WHERE waste_type='Chemical' AND disposal_location='Site A'
SELECT * FROM Inspector ins JOIN ComplianceRecord cr ON ins.inspector_name = cr.inspector_name
